title: Looking for a support for ranked who wants to learn

replies.body: This human has nothing to teach anyone, he is completely ignorant of his skill level even though he has been low elo for 4 years. Most arrogant awful player you will come across and is notorious on this forum for it.
I'm looking for a duo as well and i main jungle and a bit of support can play most support champions and understand their mechanics alright, could still use some teaching though. S4 in promos for S3

yeah man im a good support looking for an adc with a brain and dont let my rank get in the way i won 7 or my pros and lost 3 and got this so man hit me up if u want 2 play and i do know how 2 supp really well
